title: Llanelli secure Cymru South title
title_page: Llanelli secure Cymru South title - BBC Sport
maintext:
Llanelli Town have been crowned JD Cymru South champions and are a step closer to a return to the Cymru Premier.
Lee John's side drew 1-0 at Cambrian United on Friday evening while title rivals Trethomas Bluebirds lost 1-0 at Afan Lido.
Llanelli are now waiting to discover whether they have secured an FAW Tier 1 licence for their promotion to be confirmed.
The Stebonheath Park club were Welsh Premier champions in 2008 and have been runners-up three times, but last appeared in the top-flight in 2019.
